name: IEEE 802.15.4
dependencies: array of DEPENDENCIES (IDs of the technologies which are required)
info: EEE 802.15.4 is a technical standard which defines the operation of low-rate wireless personal area networks (LR-WPANs). It specifies the physical layer and media access control for LR-WPANs, and is maintained by the IEEE 802.15 working group.
